website_summaries.verdict: One of the most natural treats you can provide for a small animal, these premium, high-quality, and extremely healthy biscuits are one of the best ways to spoil your veggie-loving friend.
pros: Barley flour, alfalfa, molasses, carrots, apples, and rolled oat flakes are the first 6 ingredients
Great for rabbits, guinea pigs, and chinchillas
cons: A relatively expensive small animal treat, its organic ingredients surely drive up the price

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig's favorite
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of weeks my son's guinea pig didn't touch the biscuits, so we left two in his food bowl, but one day he ate them, and he wants to eat it every day now. He runs to us when we reach the bag of the biscuits. We only limit to two a day, but we can tell he wants more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Satomi Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Picky Bunny
customer_reviews.text: Some bunnies might like these. My rabbit didn't like them at all and took them out of her dish and threw them out of the cage! Good quality - just no interest from my own pet. Then again, she's a Lionhead and they tend to be really picky! I had a short hair dwarf floppy awhile ago and he would eat anything, including these!
customer_reviews.author: mindbuilder

customer_reviews.title: Best treat for a picky lionhead
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats my lionhead bunny will eat, and he goes crazy for them. I have offered him many other treats and he didn't accept them. It is a perfect healthy treat and I'll keep on buying these as long as he likes them. My other bunny will eat them too but she's not as picky, so I give her these and other baked treats from Oxbow; they are good and healthy for both my bunnies.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mota

customer_reviews.title: Really good! Buy if you can!
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs love these treats! They’re not loaded with sugar or anything, they probably taste good, and they’re all a guinea pig could ever want. When I grab the bag, they go crazy. Sometimes they want to steal their treats to get more, but we don’t allow that.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brawner

customer_reviews.title: My rabbit loves these treats so much. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit loves these treats so much. They are the only treat I can find that doesn't upset his tummy, and we have tried lots! I cannot find them anywhere now :( I hope Oxbow brings them back soon, my little guy misses them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: She loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my rabbit and she loves them! I feel better giving her an organic treat. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis H.

customer_reviews.title: Our bunny likes them and I feel good knowing they're approved by her vet and good for ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked for these after the vet gave her one at her visit. Our bunny likes them and I feel good knowing they're approved by her vet and good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Loves Walking Dead

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and arrived fresh and quickly. Solid experience ...
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced and arrived fresh and quickly. Solid experience and very welcomed to have the opportunity to get this product because it's the right kind of treat for my rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Domenick Cama

customer_reviews.title: ... BUNNY LOVES THESE AND THE TWO PACK IS A GREAT DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: MY BUNNY LOVES THESE AND THE TWO PACK IS A GREAT DEAL!!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Stokely

customer_reviews.title: Chinchilla loves them
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loves them! If she hears/smells me getting into the bag she runs over to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kaygirl1

customer_reviews.title: Bunny crack
customer_reviews.text: This is like crack for bunnies. My rabbit just hears the bag open and she goes nuts. She loves these things. I love that they are organic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla love this treat. He runs to me to get this snack like dog.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Piggy baby LOVES THESE
customer_reviews.text: Our piggy goes crazy for these. Everytime it hears a bag it goes nuts. As soon as you hand her one, she grabs and runs. Haha. She don't do that with other things
customer_reviews.author: nicole

product_meta.title: Oxbow Animal Health Barley Biscuits Bene Terra Organic Food and Treats, 2.65-Ounce (Pack of 2)
